          <title>
            <string language="en">Heating sugar solution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heizung Zuckerlösung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Solution de sucre de chauffage</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a glass of sugar solution heated in a pot of boiling water.</string>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un verre de solution de

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um vidro da solução do

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un vetro della

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα γυαλί της λύσης 
ζάχαρης που θερμαίνεται σε ένα δοχείο του βράζοντας ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un cristal de la
